name: Dan & Riya Beverly Valley High
description:
Welcome to the Official App of Beverly Valley High! Join Dan, Riya, and all your favorite BVHS students to see what’s happening at the school, make new friends, get the latest gossip, or start the latest drama. Log on to the BVHS app!

BVHS FEED
See what everyone’s posting on the school feed! Give Cinnamon's latest fashion choices a LIKE or react to Agnes’ latest cat pic.

MAKE FRIENDS
Get to know all the Beverly Valley students and invite them to chat. Plan schemes with Rhubarb, get to know Riya, or get farming tips from Jenny and Penny! Chat them up and make the right choices to become closer.

MEET UP
Hang out with your close friends! Go on a wild adventure with Tootsie at the beach, or cozy up with Chad on a special project.

BECOME BESTIES
Get to know everyone at Beverly Valley High and see if you can become BFFs!

Get the app now and get to know all the students at Beverly Valley High!


- I make the app myself! I AM RAJA -
